placeholderImages.description: A focused student taking an online assessment on a laptop in a modern, well-lit room, with icons representing different career fields floating around them.
A diverse group of smiling graduates in caps and gowns, celebrating their achievement on their university campus.
A young student looking thoughtfully at a large, interactive screen displaying a complex career roadmap with various branching paths.
A close-up of a hand pointing to a specific government college on a digital map application on a tablet.
A student using a calendar app on their phone, with reminders and notifications for exam dates and application deadlines.
